full_summary:
=====================================

### ITQ - Little River Dredging Tender Announcement

#### Notice Type
===============

*   Request for Information

#### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS3684530704-Doc3684543762
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3684530704
*   **Last Updated:** 2022-09-27
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-13T14:00:00 (Atlantic Time)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-07
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia

#### Tender Description
--------------------

This is the first phase of a two-phase process. In the first phase, the qualifications of all interested suppliers will be evaluated. In the second phase, qualified suppliers will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project based on specifications and drawings. The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier.

The project involves dredging at Little River, Victoria County Small Craft Harbour, Nova Scotia, and disposal of dredged material at a designated dredge material management site in Birch Plain, NS. The project is scheduled to be completed between November 7th, 2022, and December 15th, 2022.

#### Procurement Method
-------------------

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Not applicable

#### Contracting Entity
-------------------

*   **Department Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
------------------

The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*
